capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: MineOS is able to bypass file permission checks
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: MineOS is able to bypass permission checks for file operations

app_metadata.description: MineOS is a server front-end to ease managing Minecraft administrative tasks.
app_metadata.name: mineos
app_metadata.title: MineOS

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for MineOS

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username for MineOS.

schema.valid_chars_error: Username can only contain alphanumeric characters [0-9, a-z, A-Z].

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password for MineOS.

attrs.label: Stop Grace Period
attrs.description:
The time in seconds given to MineOS to stop before it is killed.
Killing a MineOS server without a grace period can cause data corruption.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that MineOS files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that MineOS files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Use HTTPS
attrs.description:
Enable HTTPS for MineOS WebUI.</br>
If enabled, and you don't specify a certificate, </br>
a self-signed certificate will be generated.

attrs.label: Certificate ID
attrs.description: The certificate to use for MineOS WebUI

attrs.label: MineOS Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store MineOS Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.2.6.readme:
MineOS

MineOS is a server front-end to ease managing Minecraft administrative tasks.
